# This file was adapted from
# https://github.com/zopefoundation/Zope/blob/zmi-bootstrap/requirements-full.txt
# which was annotated with the branch information from
# https://github.com/zopefoundation/Zope/blob/zmi-bootstrap/sources.cfg
# which it is missing as generated by default
# To regenerate the original 'requirements-full.txt'
# $ cd path/to/zope/checkout/of/zmi-bootstrap/branch && python util.py

-r https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zopefoundation/Zope/zmi-bootstrap/requirements-full.txt

-e git+https://github.com/zopefoundation/Zope.git@zmi-bootstrap#egg=Zope

# development versions of dependencies
-e git+https://github.com/zopefoundation/zmi.styles@master#egg=zmi.styles
-e git+https://github.com/zopefoundation/AccessControl@zmi-bootstrap#egg=AccessControl
-e git+https://github.com/zopefoundation/Products.BTreeFolder2@zmi-bootstrap#egg=Products.BTreeFolder2
-e git+https://github.com/zopefoundation/Products.ZCatalog@zmi-bootstrap#egg=Products.ZCatalog
-e git+https://github.com/zopefoundation/Products.PythonScripts@zmi-bootstrap#egg=Products.PythonScripts
